QuestData.Title: The Rider's Journey
QuestData.Description: Excellent, just excellent! I will return the other eggs to their nests, undisturbed.$B$BIn the meantime, deliver your egg to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Instructor Skythorn at the Arboretum in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: The wild cloud serpents live in a delicate balance with nature. Their rare eggs are quite vulnerable to enemies.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah yes, Elder Anli mentioned that a new student had joined our ranks. I see you have already chosen your cloud serpent egg.$B$BI will instruct you on its care. Let me see it for a moment.
